name: Air & Insights Agent Safety Rules
description: Policy-driven configuration for air quality safety assessment

pm25.description: PM2.5 fine particulate matter thresholds based on WHO guidelines

temperature_thresholds.description: Temperature thresholds for outdoor exercise safety

safe.recommendation: Great conditions for outdoor exercise! Enjoy your run.

moderate.recommendation: Acceptable conditions. Sensitive individuals should consider shorter workouts.

unhealthy_sensitive.recommendation: Sensitive groups (children, elderly, respiratory issues) should limit outdoor activity.

unhealthy.recommendation: Consider indoor exercise. If you must go outside, reduce intensity and duration.

very_unhealthy.recommendation: Avoid outdoor exercise. Switch to indoor activities.

hazardous.recommendation: Do NOT exercise outdoors. Stay indoors and keep windows closed.
